msg: Geir, Stefano and Steven are on the PMC now.

author: nicolaken
msg: Podlings websites SHOULD contain the Apache Incubator Project logo as sign of affiliation.
This is quite evident IMHO and descends from the fact that all incubated
project websites are published under the Incubator website URL.

author: nicolaken
msg: Add apache ids to the committer list.
Make it clear that PMC members have access to all incubator resources for oversight purposes.
